solution_line_template: Miss Adamson has a total of {num_classes} x {students_per_class} = <<{num_classes}*{students_per_class}={total_students}>>{total_students} students.
Thus, she will use {total_students} x {sheets_per_student} = <<{total_students}*{sheets_per_student}={total_sheets}>>{total_sheets} sheets of paper for all of her students.
